name: Michelada Zero Proof
description: Non-alcoholic cocktails have found their audience thanks to recipes whose composition gives the impression of drinking an alcoholic beverage! This one is a sort of zero proof Bloody Mary, but with as much salty and spicy energy as the original.
directions: Choose a highball glass, tall and slender, like a lemonade glass.
Frost your glass with chili powder on the rim.
Pour in the lemon juice and condiments.
Add tomato juice and non-alcoholic beer.
Stir with a bar spoon and check the seasoning.
